Posts.Content: I am working 4 days a week, my company is more then supportive!! However the union is demanding I work my 40 +over time. Anyone have this issue or any ideas??
Posts.Title: Union harassment

Posts.Content: Its a monthly schedule, everyone's on it. Edited April 30, 2019 at 1:50 pm
Posts.Title: Union harassment

Posts.Content: The monthly schedule is in the break room showing what days I work. There is also a list of call-ins for who have worked overtime. Union is demanding I work my regular 5th day and that I work overtime hours as well!! Edited April 30, 2019 at 1:44 pm
